items.summary: Create a dedicated protected page (e.g., '/signups') that displays the list of all players who have signed up for Blue Panthers. The page must require the user to be signed in via Internet Identity before the sign-up list is shown. If the user is not authenticated, display a prompt to sign in rather than the list.

Expose or reuse the existing backend query that returns all sign-ups so the new protected page can fetch the full list of sign-ups for authenticated callers. Ensure the query is accessible to any authenticated user (not only admins) if that is the intended access level, or confirm it remains admin-gated.
